name: NORT (M_to_the_B)
description:
Take a trip through NORT's world in this 1st-person puzzle-platformer game.  

Guide our nameless and voiceless hero back home as you traverse 13 levels by manipulating primitive shaped objects using abilities derived from NORT's leftover code fragments for Animation, Color, Destroy, Force, Physics, and Scale.

View playthrough videos, with developer commentary, on YouTube.  

Disclaimer:  I'm not a professional game developer, programmer, or artist.  But that shouldn't stop you from playing my game; what's the worst that could happen?

Disclaimer+:  I created this game over 4+ years in my spare time while learning everything from the game engine (Unity), C# scripting, game design, animation, etc.   It took me over two week to get the boat to land correctly...two weeks!   

Disclaimer++:  My game has as many distinct playthough modes as this page has disclaimers, but you'll need to be a gamer to even get started.  All sales are final - just kidding, downloads are FREE but donations are appreciated.  Thank you and enjoy!

Special Thanks to the following:

Packt Publishing Limited and Will Goldstone's book Unity 3.x Game Development Essentials.  Permission was granted for use of the books assets and a 3D model of the book.  And I credit the book for getting me starting me on my game development journey.  

TTSReader, Text To Speech Reader, for helping bring NORT alive.

System Requirements:

Optimized for 1440 x 900 resolution (can play in window).

Mac: 

  • OS: OS X 10.9 or higher 
  • Processor: 1.6ghz processor or higher                                                                    
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM                                                                                                                   
  • Graphics: Onboard or dedicated graphics with 256MB+ of video RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

Windows: 

  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.6ghz Intel i5-equivalent processor or higher 
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM 
  • Graphics: Onboard or dedicated graphics with 256MB+ of video RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

Please let me know if you experience any issues, I'll do my best to address them.
